apps.name: Calculator
apps.description: Basic calculator with standard arithmetic operations
apps.icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 100 100'><defs><linearGradient id='calc_bg' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#505050'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#202020'/></linearGradient></defs><rect x='22' y='15' width='56' height='70' rx='6' fill='url(#calc_bg)' stroke='#101010' stroke-width='2'/><rect x='27' y='22' width='46' height='16' rx='2' fill='#c5d96f' stroke='#909030' stroke-width='1'/><g fill='#606060'><rect x='30' y='44' width='9' height='9' rx='2'/><rect x='44' y='44' width='9' height='9' rx='2'/><rect x='58' y='44' width='9' height='9' rx='2'/><rect x='30' y='57' width='9' height='9' rx='2'/><rect x='44' y='57' width='9' height='9' rx='2'/><rect x='58' y='57' width='9' height='9' rx='2'/><rect x='30' y='70' width='9' height='9' rx='2'/><rect x='44' y='70' width='9' height='9' rx='2'/></g><rect x='58' y='70' width='9' height='9' rx='2' fill='#ff9800'/></svg>

apps.name: Text Edit
apps.description: Simple text editor for notes and documents
apps.icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 100 100'><rect x='28' y='15' width='44' height='70' rx='2' fill='#ffffff' stroke='#a0a0a0' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='33' y1='25' x2='67' y2='25' stroke='#d0d0d0' stroke-width='1.5'/><line x1='33' y1='35' x2='67' y2='35' stroke='#d0d0d0' stroke-width='1.5'/><line x1='33' y1='45' x2='60' y2='45' stroke='#d0d0d0' stroke-width='1.5'/><line x1='33' y1='55' x2='67' y2='55' stroke='#d0d0d0' stroke-width='1.5'/><g transform='translate(55,55) rotate(-30)'><rect x='0' y='0' width='6' height='28' rx='1' fill='#ffb300' stroke='#e68a00' stroke-width='1'/><polygon points='0,28 6,28 3,34' fill='#404040'/></g></svg>

apps.name: HTML Coder
apps.description: HTML code editor with live preview support
apps.icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 100 100'><rect x='18' y='18' width='64' height='64' rx='8' fill='#2c2c2c'/><text x='50' y='60' font-family='monospace' font-weight='bold' font-size='26' fill='#00e676' text-anchor='middle'></></text></svg>

apps.name: Tetris

apps.name: Slither
apps.description: Grow your snake and avoid collision

apps.name: App Builder
apps.description: Create your own Y-OS applications with visual editor
